metadata.name: The Lost Village
metadata.description:
Somewhere in Spain, the sun rises to light up  this little village. 
It is lost behind the mountains, by the sea, yet quite well known because it is the village of the famous Salvador Dali.

I arrived there a morning, a lovely weekend with a woman that i never saw again.
 this village is for me a true piece of art, I will forever remember this morning which was like a dream.

this timelapse was very difficult to achieve.
 there was a lot of wind.
But as Salvador Dali said: “No masterpiece in laziness!”
